title: Junior Programmer to Senior Engineer
subtitle: Cheatsheet for an Employee Development Plan

items.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
items.description: In-depth knowledge of algorithms and data structures to improve code efficiency

items.name: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
items.description: Design patterns and principles for creating modular, scalable Python code

items.name: Database Management (SQL and NoSQL)
items.description: Working knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases for data persistence

items.name: Testing and Debugging
items.description: Writing unit, integration, and functional tests for code reliability and maintainability

items.name: System Design and Architecture
items.description: Understanding system design patterns, scalability, and architecture principles

items.name: Distributed Systems
items.description: Designing and implementing distributed systems for high availability and fault tolerance

items.name: Git and Version Control
items.description: Version control skills for collaborative and reliable code management

items.name: Docker and Containerization
items.description: Creating isolated, reproducible environments for applications

items.name: SQL and NoSQL Databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
items.description: Experience with both relational and NoSQL databases for different use cases

items.name: Unit Testing Frameworks (e.g., pytest)
items.description: Proficiency in writing and running tests to ensure code quality

items.name: CI/CD Tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions)
items.description: Setting up automated testing, deployment pipelines, and continuous integration

items.name: AWS or GCP for Cloud Computing
items.description: Deploying and managing applications in the cloud for scalability and resilience

items.name: Monitoring Tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
items.description: Using monitoring tools to ensure application performance and detect issues early

items.name: Python Programming Specialization
items.description: Certification in advanced Python programming concepts

items.name: Data Structures and Algorithms in Python
items.description: Detailed course on optimizing Python code with efficient data structures

items.name: Object-Oriented Design in Python
items.description: Learn OOP principles and design patterns to build modular code

items.name: System Design Primer
items.description: Foundational workshop on system design concepts for building scalable systems

items.name: Cloud Practitioner Certification
items.description: Foundational knowledge of cloud services, networking, and storage

items.name: Advanced Testing and CI/CD
items.description: Comprehensive course on testing strategies and CI/CD pipelines

items.name: Code Reviews and Collaboration
items.description: Experience with peer code reviews and collaborative development practices

items.name: Documentation Practices
items.description: Writing effective documentation for code readability and maintainability

items.name: Mentoring Junior Developers
items.description: Providing guidance and support to junior developers

items.name: Cross-Functional Communication
items.description: Communicating effectively with non-technical teams about technical work

career_scenarios.name: Backend Engineer (Intermediate Level)
career_scenarios.description: Focus on building scalable backend systems and improving performance.
career_scenarios.notes: Develop skills in databases, RESTful APIs, and Python frameworks such as Django or Flask.

career_scenarios.name: Senior Software Engineer
career_scenarios.description: Lead engineering projects, architect solutions, and mentor junior team members.
career_scenarios.notes: Gain expertise in system design and focus on developing leadership skills.

career_scenarios.name: Cloud Solutions Architect
career_scenarios.description: Design and manage cloud-based architectures for scalable applications.
career_scenarios.notes: Develop expertise in AWS or GCP, and complete a cloud architect certification.

career_scenarios.name: Engineering Team Lead
career_scenarios.description: Lead a team of developers, manage project timelines, and ensure code quality.
career_scenarios.notes: Focus on people management skills, project management, and technical mentoring.

career_scenarios.name: Technical Product Manager (Python Focus)
career_scenarios.description: Transition to a role focusing on product management for Python-based solutions.
career_scenarios.notes: Develop skills in product strategy, customer interaction, and feature prioritization.
